abstract: Though the price tag for the Petrohawk deal appears high, BHP Billiton believes it is acquiring quality natural gas assets for a good price, since the independent energy company needed more capital.
snippet: Though the price tag for the Petrohawk deal appears high, BHP Billiton believes it is acquiring quality natural gas assets for a good price, since the independent energy company needed more capital.
lead_paragraph: BHP Billiton‘s $12.1 billion purchase of Petrohawk Energy places a hefty premium on the independent energy company. But in the deal, BHP believes it is getting a bargain.

headline.main: In Petrohawk’s Sale to BHP, a Quest for Capital

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
